meanings.definition: A shape with eight angles and eight sides.
meanings.sent1: The children drew an octangle in their art class.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign has an octangle shape to help drivers know when to stop.
meanings.sent3: The octangle on the playground looked like a giant spider web.
meanings.sent4: Her earrings dangled like shimmering octangles in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The octangle in the math book was colored in bright red.

meanings.definition: To form or arrange in the shape of an octangle.
meanings.sent1: She tried to octangle the pieces of the puzzle together.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to octangle the metal wires into a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent3: He octangled the spaghetti on his plate into a messy pile.
meanings.sent4: The dancers octangled themselves into a beautiful formation on stage.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully octangled the bushes into geometric shapes.
